summary: The Genis-Vell Marvel Legends Figure Does Not Spoil the Character's Appearance in Captain Marvel
title: The Genis-Vell Marvel Legends Figure Does Not Spoil the Character's Appearance in Captain Marvel
body:
Over the weekend numerous websites ran sensationalist headlines screaming at the top of their lungs how the Marvel Legends Genis-Vell figure is a spoiler for Captain Marvel based on an error on the Disney Store website.

The Genis-Vell Marvel Legends figure is part of the first Captain Marvelwabe of action figures, and if anyone collects these figures they know that the Marvel Legends waves…

View On WordPress

summary: In promo material for Marvel Studios Captain Marvel, (in theaters March 8, 2019) Carol Danvers can be seen as part of the elite...
body:
In promo material for Marvel Studios Captain Marvel, (in theaters March 8, 2019) Carol Danvers can be seen as part of the elite Kree Starforce team, where she is simply known as “Vers”. The Starforce team wears matching Black and Green suits, which you can see in this exclusive image from Entertainment Weekly:

We recently got a hold of the Vers Starforce suit Funko Pop! figure and brought it to our Light Box to review it for you. Use the PAGES buttons below to navigate the review and check out the purchasing options on the last Page if you’re looking to add this to your collection!

Continue to the Pop! Captain Marvel – Vers Review!

“Heroes. Noble warrior heroes.”

Let’s kick off this Pop! Captain Marvel – Vers review with a look at the official image from Funko:

Continue to the Picture Review:

Here is the Pop! Captain Marvel – Vers vinyl Bobble-Head figure in the box.

This Pop! Marvel – Captain Marvel window display box is numbered 427.

Continue to the Un-Boxing:

Here is the Vers Funko Pop! out of the box.

This collectible vinyl figure uses a clear plastic stand for display out of the box.

Continue for Final Thoughts:

The Pop! Marvel Captain Marvel – Vers figure is a good companion the GameStop Exclusive reviewed here:

Masked Version: GameStop Exclusive Vers Funko Pop!

I really like the Kree Starforce suit! The only negative nitpick here is the paint deco imperfections around the forehead, other than that, this is a great figure in a cool pose. Definitely recommended for Captain Marvel fans! Use the helpful Links below to order the Pop! Captain Marvel – Vers vinyl figure #427:

  • Order from Entertainment Earth:
  • Order from BoxLunch:
  • Order from Hot Topic:
  • Order from TFAW:
Pop! Captain Marvel – Vers Review! In promo material for Marvel Studios Captain Marvel, (in theaters March 8, 2019) Carol Danvers can be seen as part of the elite…

blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

blog.title: Captain Marvel the Kree
blog.description: Tribute blog to Marvel's (Kree) Captains Marvel: Mar-Vell, Genis-Vell, Carol Danvers, Phyla-Vell, Noh-Varr and associates (so, also Guardians of the Galaxy, Rick Jones, Thanos, Adam Warlock, Quasar, The Avengers and Cosmic Stuff in general, Hulkling and the Young Avengers, etc).

tags: stop hating on my precious babies
summary: I have this thing going on where I start loving a character after they've been insulted for no reason.
body:
I have this thing going on where I start loving a character after they’ve been insulted for no reason.

Like.. Before I was like… Yeah, I like the character, they’re fine

And then someone says something negative about them and I’m just like “What the fuck?” And turn on my defensive-mode and they become my favorite character over night.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: boundingintocomics
blog.title: Bounding Into Comics
blog.description: Your Best Source for News, Reviews, and Opinion when it comes to Comics!

title: Comic Book Review: Captain Marvel #1
body:
Comic Book Review: Captain Marvel #1

Wherein the world looks a little brighter and happier again even though we have a questionable choice for a first issue bad guy and a colorist ruining the dance party.

has a lot going for it, despite some serious shortcomings. Comparatively speaking, this issue is phenomenal. It’s far better than anything that’s been done with this title in the last few years. If you take that comparison away…

View On WordPress
